Uses of Package
nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene

  • Packages that use nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.mocks  
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene
    Our own extensions to Lucene, used by BlackLab.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene.optimize  
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.matchfilter  
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.results
    Classes for dealing with results, either per-hit or per-document or grouped
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.textpattern  
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene used by nl.inl.blacklab.mocks 
    Class and Description
    BLSpanQuery
    A required interface for a BlackLab SpanQuery.
    BLSpans
    Will be the base class for all our own Spans classes.
    BLSpanWeight
    Base class for our SpanWeight classes.
    HitQueryContext
    Provides per-hit query-wide context, such as captured groups.
    SpansInBuckets
    Interface to retrieve whole sequences of certain matches (in "buckets") instead of individual matches like with Spans.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene used by nl.inl.blacklab.search 
    Class and Description
    BLSpanQuery
    A required interface for a BlackLab SpanQuery.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene used by nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene 
    Class and Description
    BLSpanQuery
    A required interface for a BlackLab SpanQuery.
    BLSpans
    Will be the base class for all our own Spans classes.
    BLSpanTermQuery
    BL-specific subclass of SpanTermQuery that changes what getField() returns (the annotated field name instead of the full Lucene field name) in order to be able to combine queries in different Lucene fields using AND and OR.
    BLSpanWeight
    Base class for our SpanWeight classes.
    HitQueryContext
    Provides per-hit query-wide context, such as captured groups.
    SpanQueryAndNot
    A SpanQuery for an AND NOT query.
    SpanQueryExpansion.Direction 
    SpanQueryFiSeq
    Find hits that match the specified NFA, starting from the specified anchor query (either the start of end of those hits, with a possible offset added), in the specified direction.
    SpanQueryPositionFilter
    Filters hits from a producer query based on the hit positions of a filter query.
    SpanQueryPositionFilter.Operation
    The different positional operations
    SpanQuerySequence
    Combines spans, keeping only combinations of hits that occur one after the other.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene used by nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene.optimize 
    Class and Description
    BLSpanQuery
    A required interface for a BlackLab SpanQuery.
